tool_description: Adjusts volume levels of audio tracks with gain control, normalization options, and envelope-based automation curves.

gain_db.description: Gain adjustment in decibels (-60 to +20 dB)

target_lufs.description: Target LUFS level for normalization (-40 to -6)

limiter_enable.description: Enable peak limiter to prevent clipping

error_messages: Invalid track ID: The specified track_id does not exist.
Gain out of range: gain_db must be between -60 and +20 dB.
Invalid LUFS target: target_lufs must be between -40 and -6 LUFS.
Invalid limiter threshold: limiter_threshold must be between -6 and -0.1 dB.
Processing failed: Unable to apply volume adjustments to the track.
usage: Provide track_id and desired gain_db. Use normalize=true with target_lufs for consistent levels. Enable limiter_enable with limiter_threshold to prevent clipping.

peak_level_db.description: Peak level after processing in dB
